column2: the Hot Rock is always a fun dish
column3: especially for children. I strongly recommend it for first-timers
column4: though I don't think it's a value priced dish. Likewise
column7: is enjoyable but not substance-to-price friendly. My personal favorite is the saba shio
column8: a grilled mackerel that's wonderfully salty
column9: mellowed out by squirts of lemon.
